description: Retrieves the details of the specified speaker search task.

parameters.name: SpeakerSearchTaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the speaker search task.

nested_items.name: SpeakerSearchTask
nested_items.description: The details of the speaker search task.

nested_items.name: SpeakerSearchTaskStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the speaker search task, IN_QUEUE, IN_PROGRESS, PARTIAL_SUCCESS, SUCCEEDED, FAILED, or STOPPED.

nested_items.name: CallDetails
nested_items.description: The call details of a speaker search task.

nested_items.name: TransactionId
nested_items.description: The transaction ID of a Voice Connector call.

nested_items.name: IsCaller
nested_items.description: Identifies a person as the caller or the callee.

nested_items.name: SpeakerSearchDetails
nested_items.description: The details of a speaker search task.

nested_items.name: Results
nested_items.description: The result value in the speaker search details.

nested_items.name: ConfidenceScore
nested_items.description: The confidence score in the speaker search analysis.

nested_items.name: VoiceprintGenerationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of a voice print generation operation, VoiceprintGenerationSuccess or VoiceprintGenerationFailure..

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a speaker search task was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a speaker search task was updated.

nested_items.name: StartedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the speaker search task began.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A detailed message about the status of a speaker search.
